document.full_text: japan has asked nuclear superpower russia to send a special radiation treatment ship used to decommission nuclear submarines as it fights to contain the world's worst atomic crisis since chernobyl, japanese media said late on monday.
document.title: japan seeks russian help to end nuclear crisis
lines_and_colors: japan has asked nuclear superpower russia to send a special radiation treatment ship used to decommission nuclear submarines as it fights to contain the world's worst atomic crisis since chernobyl, japanese media said late on monday.
